paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant V30M, including penetrance data and patient demographics.

patients.phenotype: ATTRV30M amyloidosis with unilateral scalloped iris

functional_data.summary: The study assessed aqueous humor flare values in ATTRV30M patients.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is associated with the disease in the studied cohort.
variants.evidence_level: strong evidence for pathogenicity based on clinical presentation and genetic analysis
variants.additional_notes: The study focused on the ocular manifestations of the TTR V30M variant.
key_quotes: All patients had the ATTR V30M mutation confirmed by genetic analysis and presented unilateral scalloped iris.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper focused on a specific variant in the TTR gene.
